alquran.name: Ash-Shams
alquran.description: Surat Asy Syams terdiri atas 15 ayat, termasuk golongan surat-surat Makkiyyah, diturunkan sesudah surat Al Qadar. Dinamai Asy Syams (matahari) diambil dari perkataan Asy Syams yang terdapat pada ayat permulaan surat ini.

translate.id: Demi matahari dan cahayanya di pagi hari,
translate.en: CONSIDER the sun and its radiant brightness,
and the moon as it reflects the sun!
Consider the day as it reveals the world,
and the night as it veils it darkly!
Consider the sky and its wondrous make,
and the earth and all its expanse!
Consider the human self, and how it is formed in accordance with what it is meant to be,

translate.id: maka Allah mengilhamkan kepada jiwa itu (jalan) kefasikan dan ketakwaannya.
translate.en: and how it is imbued with moral failings as well as with consciousness of God!

translate.id: sesungguhnya beruntunglah orang yang mensucikan jiwa itu,
translate.en: To a happy state shall indeed attain he who causes this [self] to grow in purity,

translate.id: dan sesungguhnya merugilah orang yang mengotorinya.
translate.en: and truly lost is he who buries it [in darkness].

translate.id: (Kaum) Tsamud telah mendustakan (rasulnya) karena mereka melampaui batas,
translate.en: TO [THIS] TRUTH gave the lie, in their overweening arrogance, [the tribe of] Thamud,

translate.id: ketika bangkit orang yang paling celaka di antara mereka,
translate.en: when that most hapless wretch from among them rushed forward [to commit his evil deed],

surah.arab: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
surah.latin: faqaala lahum rasuulu allaahi naaqata allaahi wasuqyaahaa

translate.id: lalu Rasul Allah (Saleh) berkata kepada mereka: ("Biarkanlah) unta betina Allah dan minumannya".
translate.en: although God's apostle had told them, "It is a she-camel belonging to God, so let her drink [and do her no harm]!"

surah.arab: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ بِذَنْبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
surah.latin: fakadzdzabuuhu fa'aqaruuhaa fadamdama 'alayhim rabbuhum bidzanbihim fasawwaahaa

translate.id: Lalu mereka mendustakannya dan menyembelih unta itu, maka Tuhan mereka membinasakan mereka disebabkan dosa mereka, lalu Allah menyama-ratakan mereka (dengan tanah),
translate.en: But they gave him the lie, and cruelly slaughtered her - whereupon their Sustainer visited them with utter destruction for this their sin, destroying them all alike:

translate.id: dan Allah tidak takut terhadap akibat tindakan-Nya itu.
translate.en: for none [of them] had any fear of what might befall them.
